parameters.name: InfluenceType
parameters.description: 0 = Global 1 = To Next Curve 2 = To Next Sharp 3 = To Next Edge

parameters.name: TrimCurves
parameters.description: 0 = False to trim curves 1 = True to trim curves

parameters.name: BlendClosed
parameters.description: True closes this boundary feature or boundary surface feature, false leaves this boundary feature or boundary surface feature open

title: IFeatureManager.SetNetBlendDirectionData
description: Sets the curve set data (one for each of the two directions) for this boundary feature or boundary surface feature.
signature:

   System.Int16
Direction
,
   System.Int16

,
   System.Int16
TrimCurves
,
   System.Boolean
BlendClosed
,
   System.Boolean
SplitSurfaces
)

parameters.name: TrimCurves
